GET:
WITH logged_user AS (
            SELECT
                user_id,
                user_is_admin,
                user_is_inactive
            FROM users u
            JOIN session s ON u.user_id = s.session_user_id
            WHERE (#session-token# IS NOT NULL) AND (s.session_token = #session-token#)
            LIMIT 1
        )

        SELECT 
            r.region_id as id,
            r.region_name as name
        FROM
            logged_user lu,
            region r
            LEFT JOIN trapline tl
                ON tl.trapline_region_id = r.region_id
            LEFT JOIN trapline_user tlu
                ON tlu.trapline_user_trapline_id = tl.trapline_id
        WHERE
            (lu.user_is_inactive = false) AND
            ((lu.user_is_admin = true) OR (tlu.trapline_user_user_id = lu.user_id))
        GROUP BY
            r.region_id
        ORDER BY
            r.region_id
